expo.name: SalesSyncAI

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: SalesSyncAI needs location access to track field visits and verify agent locations for accurate reporting.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: SalesSyncAI needs location access to track field visits and verify agent locations for accurate reporting.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: SalesSyncAI needs camera access to capture photos during visits, surveys, and campaign activations.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: SalesSyncAI needs photo library access to select and upload images for reports and documentation.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: SalesSyncAI may need microphone access for voice notes and recordings during field activities.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow SalesSyncAI to use your location to track field visits and verify agent locations for accurate reporting.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow SalesSyncAI to access your camera to capture photos during visits, surveys, and campaign activations.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow SalesSyncAI to access your photo library to select and upload images for reports and documentation.

expo.description: SalesSyncAI Mobile - Complete field sales, marketing campaigns, and activation management solution with AI-powered insights and offline capabilities.
